in.srain.cube.views.ptr.header

类 MaterialProgressDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • in.srain.cube.views.ptr.header.MaterialProgressDrawable
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Animatable

    public class MaterialProgressDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
implements android.graphics.drawable.Animatable
    Fancy progress indicator for Material theme. It's taken from android.support.v4.widget. I've done some slight changes.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • updateSizes

        public void updateSizes(int size)
        Set the overall size for the progress spinner. This updates the radius and stroke width of the ring.
        参数:
        size - One of LARGE or DEFAULT

      • showArrow

        public void showArrow(boolean show)
        参数:
        show - Set to true to display the arrowhead on the progress spinner.

      • setArrowScale

        public void setArrowScale(float scale)
        参数:
        scale - Set the scale of the arrowhead for the spinner.

      • setStartEndTrim

        public void setStartEndTrim(float startAngle,
                            float endAngle)
        Set the start and end trim for the progress spinner arc.
        参数:
        startAngle - start angle
        endAngle - end angle

      • setProgressRotation

        public void setProgressRotation(float rotation)
        Set the amount of rotation to apply to the progress spinner.
        参数:
        rotation - Rotation is from [0..1]

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(int color)
        Update the background color of the circle image view.

      • setColorSchemeColors

        public void setColorSchemeColors(int... colors)
        Set the colors used in the progress animation from color resources. The first color will also be the color of the bar that grows in response to a user swipe gesture.
        参数:
        colors -
